name: my birb ivory lays egg in jungle
name_original: my birb ivory lays egg in jungle
description:
my pet budgie ivory is getting chased by flock of paparazzi budgies in the jungle. your objective is to lay (shoot) eggs to avoid getting taken glamour shot by them. don't lose your pretty preens, too.

score 15000 to win. 

controls:

WASD or Mouse to move (you can change between them)

Enter or click to shoot

ESC to call menu
